author: dapplion
content:
Hey noticed that for config/spec route each client returns a self selected list of items. 

For example LH: https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/bac7c3fa544495a257722aaad9cd8f72fee2f2b4/consensus/types/src/chain_spec.rs#L941

Should the API spec provide this list? That sounds a bit unmantainable but could help have more cohesion

author: dapplion
content: Lodestar's validator client compares the beacon's spec with the local spec to ensure they match, but we have to intersect them instead of equal due to the issue above

author: ajsutton
content: hmm, it should be the constants, presets and config items from the spec. Though the spec does change those without any concern for backwards compatibility so things do get a little entertaining at times. It is definitely an API you need to ignore unrecognised items as new things can (and have) appear at any point.
